reviewText: Making the transition from Point-and-Shoot photography wasn't easy. When I purchased my Nikon DSLR camera, I found some of the new concepts quite confusing. I found this DVD to be a clear and informative guide, introducing me to the camera and basic photography concepts which I had never understood before. It was perfect for a first-time DSLR user like me. I uploaded some segments from the DVD. (The clips are shown with Beacon Camera's permission)
